str_scan_user_qrcode_hint: Scan this QR code to find me
str_scan_channel_qrcode_hint: Scan the QR code to join the channel
please_enter_user_address: Please enter npub address or DNS
report_reason_title: WHAT DO YOU WANT TO REPORT?
message_delete_hint: Really want to delete this message?
not_friends_send_message_prompts: Sorry, you can only send messages to mutual contacts at the moment.
remove_contacts_dialog_content: Are you sure you want to remove ${name} from the contacts?
import_follows_tips: Import follows and add them as Contacts:
import_follows_success_dialog: Import successful! Share 0xChat with your contacts
str_secret_center_hint:
• Use end-to-end encryption (NIP-44)
• Prevent metadata leaks (NIP-59)
• Forward secrecy (NIP-101)
• Irrecoverable on other devices
• Screenshot detection
• Messages will be sent only to the relay you/counterparty specify:
badge_requirement_tips: Only users who have met the badge requirements are authorized to send messages.
badge_no_requirement_tips: No badge is required in this channel.
mute_fail_toast: Mute(Unmute) failed, please try again later.
secret_chat_tips: For enhanced privacy, you can select a specific relay for your secret chat; all secret chat messages will only be sent to this relay.
secret_chat_relay_enter_tips: Please select relay or enter relay
block_dialog_content: After blocking, you will no longer receive messages from them.
message_delete_tips: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation and local messages?
secret_message_delete_tips: Once deleted, secret messages cannot be recovered. Are you sure you want to proceed?
secret_message_reject_tips: Are you sure reject and delete？
leave_channel_tips: Are you sure you want to leave the channel?
send_zap_tips: Are you sure you want to send this zap?
secret_chat_accepted_tips: You have accepted ${name}'s secret chat request.
create_secret_chat_tips:
Note:

1.Secret chat is implemented based on NIP-104 Nostr MLS. Creating a secret chat will create a new MLS group.

2.Each secret chat session is independent and cannot be recovered once deleted.

3.For your safety and privacy, secret chat messages will only be sent to the relay you choose.

4.This secret chat feature is still in beta. Please use it for testing purposes only.
create_group_search_hint_text: Who would you like to add？
create_group_select_toast: Please select at least one user
select_at_least_one_member: Please select at least one member
group_share_tips: Are you sure you want to share a group chat link with your friends
create_group_fail_tips: Failed to create group chat. Please check if the other party has used a client that supports NostrMLS.
no_available_keypackages_content: Not available key packages. Invite your friend(s) to connect?
delete_group_tips: Delete and remove all group members?
enabled_group_join_verification: This Group has enabled group-join verification. An invitation by a current group admin is required to join.
edit_group_name_not_empty_toast: The group name cannot be empty
scan_qr_code_join_group: Scan the QR code to join the group
group_invited_item: ${name} invited you to join the Group
confirm_join_dialog_content: The group owner has required 'invitation Approval'. you can add an join reason to give the group owner and admin.
request_join_toast_success: Request to join the group successful
request_join_ignore_member: Confirm whether to ignore the member
request_join_accept_member: Confirm whether to accept the member
remove_member_confirm_content: Are you sure you want to remove {count} member(s) from the group?
set_normal_dm_system: ${username} Set the current conversation as normal DM
set_gift_wrapped_dm_system: ${username} Set the current conversation as gift-wrapped DM
ecash_mint_unselected_hint: Must select mint to send ecash
ecash_quantity_exceed_amount_hint: The quantity cannot exceed the amount
no_sessions_description: Tap the + button in the top right corner to start a new chat.
user_dmrelay_not_set_hint_message: Warning: The recipient has not set up a DM relay, and may not receive your NIP-17 private message
user_dmrelay_not_connect_hint_message: Warning: Fail to connect to the recipient's DM relays
my_dmrelay_not_set_hint_message: Warning: You have not set up a DM relay, please go to "Me-Settings-Relays" to configure it
str_group_open_description: NIP-29 relay-based groups implementation. Anyone can find and join the group
str_group_close_description: NIP-29 relay-based groups implementation. People can only join if they are added or accepted via a join request
str_group_private_description: NIP-17 chat room implementation. All messages are gift-wrapped to each group member
str_public_channel_description: NIP-28 public chat implementation. Anyone can join and send messages freely
str_group_show_description: Group information are visible to non-group members
str_group_hidden_description: Group information are hidden from non-group members
str_group_visit_verify_hint: This Group has enabled group-join verification. An invitation by a current group admin is required to join.
str_group_join_request_msg_delete_tips: Once deleted, the messages cannot be recovered. Are you sure you want to proceed?
str_group_admin_manage_hint: You can add admins to help you manage your group. Press and hold to remove them.
str_add_admin_search_hint: Who would you like to add？
search_tips_discovery: Try searching keywords naddr or relay URL
delete_message_me_and_other_action_mode: Request to delete for me and ${otherName}
media_message_delete_tips: Are you sure you want to delete this local media messages?
select_key_package_description: Multiple key packages are available for this user. Please select one to continue.
no_oxchat_lite_keypackages_warning: No XChat key packages found. These are from other clients and may not work properly for communication.
other_client_keypackages_warning: Warning: These key packages are from other clients. Communication may not work properly.
chat_input_length_over_hint: The text you entered is too long to send.
str_remove_moments_hint: Are you sure you want to remove the moment? This action cannot be undone.
name: Name
create_secret_chat_confirm_content: Are you sure you want to start a new private chat and send an invitation to the other person?
delete_group_confirm_content: This action will permanently delete the group and cannot be undone. All group data will be lost.
leave_group_confirm_content: You will no longer receive messages from this group and will need to be re-invited to rejoin.
leave_group_title: Are you sure you want to leave ${chatName}?
leave_and_delete_group_title: Are you sure you want to leave and delete ${chatName}?
delete_for_me_content: This will only delete the chat from your device. The other person will still have the conversation.
delete_for_all_content: This will attempt to delete the chat for both you and ${userName}. They may not see the messages anymore.
clear_history_content: This action will delete all message history but keep the conversation.
delete_group_content: Deleting this group will remove all members and all messages will be lost. Do you want to delete the group?
leave_group_content: You will no longer receive messages from this group and will need to be re-invited to rejoin.
